name: AllBoomGame
summary:
AllBoomGame is a free mobile battle royale.

Fun battles1vs1 and survival mode for mobile devices.

There are different maps and leagues that, depending on the games, each player will get. Use all the weapons you find on the map to eliminate your opponents.

CHOOSE YOUR PREFERRED GAME MODE:

- Ranked: is a ranking type game mode that works with leagues. To climb the leagues and discover the different maps in the game, you can get pixels killing your opponents.

- Free: it is a type of combat against a single opponent. There is no classification.

COLLECT ALL SKINS:

Make your character different from the rest! Get all the skins in the game and combine them in a fun way.
There are two ways to get the skins: with Gems or Amokens.

DISCOVER ALL SKILLS:

In each game there are 1 or 2 keys that are randomly held by a player. The player in question who has the key can get it when he finds the portal that will be open for a limited time. At any time, the other opponents can fight to get their opponent's key. The keys obtained will allow us to buy skills.
